# 8.0 Docs

## Deployment

- [Host determines RID-specific assets](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/deployment/8.0/rid-asset-list.md): Learn about the breaking change in deployment in .NET 8 where the runtime host looks for RID-specific assets via a known list.
- [.NET Monitor only includes distroless images](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/deployment/8.0/monitor-image.md): Learn about the breaking change in deployment in .NET 8 where the .NET Monitor 8 image offering only includes distroless images.
- [.NET packages for openSUSE and SLES depend on OpenSSL 3.x](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/deployment/8.0/opensuse-sles-openssl3-dependency.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 8 where .NET packages for openSUSE and SLES distributions now depend on OpenSSL 3.x instead of OpenSSL 1.x.
- [StripSymbols defaults to true](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/deployment/8.0/stripsymbols-default.md): Learn about the breaking change in deployment where the default value for 'StripSymbols' is now 'true' for 'PublishAOT'.
